content.p: The Department of Chemical and Environmental Engineering is known for the quality of its research. The Department is recognised for its world-class learning environment and its international reputation for new knowledge generation. In 2024 Guardian University Guide, we are rated as a UK top 5 chemical engineering department. https://www.theguardian.com/education/universityguide Information about our undergraduate courses. Get information about taught postgraduate and research degrees. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
